content: I'm sorry to hear that you don't find me helpful. Please understand that as an AI language model, my aim is to assist to the best of my ability using the information that I have. While I strive to provide accurate and helpful responses, I acknowledge that I may sometimes fall short or be unable to provide the specific details you are looking for. However, I am constantly learning and improving, and I am always available to help with any questions or concerns you may have.
